t: American Stove Company | MyCompanies Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - The American Stove Company was founded in 1901 by Charles A. Stockstrom in St. Louis, Missouri. Its industry was stoves and its headquarters is in Wood Dale, Illinois. In 1957, it merged with the Food Giant Markets of California. In 1958, it was sold to Dixie Products, Inc.
